channel.title: How do you get exposure with Auxy?
channel.description: üòïSoooo,I have a pretty decent following on SoundCloud but no support from auxy or fellow Auxy users. I want the creators to see how far they have taken their users. house/techno/edm isn‚Äôt the only music that exists..üôÑ

item.title: How do you get exposure with Auxy?
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
Suggestions:

  • Message people. Don‚Äôt DM spam people your links, that‚Äôs almost always a bad idea ‚Äì building actual relationships with people works a million times better, so people don‚Äôt think you‚Äôre just there to get their reposts. And I don‚Äôt say this primarily as a technique just to get plays; it can be useful for so many other things. Just know that people will be a lot more positively disposed toward you if your limited Internet relationship is more than just repost trading.
  • As for specific forum engagement ‚Äì posting your links unfortunately won‚Äôt do much. You may get support from a couple super dedicated members but overall you won‚Äôt grow too much. See point #1!

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get exposure with Auxy?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Hi! Agreed with @xavior as above - engaging around here. There also the Auxy Collective on Discord with quite a few folks from around here, and some from not around here.

If you‚Äôve got a following on SC already you probably don‚Äôt need to worry much, but there‚Äôs plenty of friendly folks here to provide feedback and to and receive from.

There‚Äôs quite a few people not writing house/techno/EDM I think you‚Äôll find

Read full topic

spread your sound all over various social media platforms. invest some time and maybe even some coin into promotions. participate in blogs, music discord servers, Twitter threads‚Ä¶

sadly no one just comes across and will build your foundation for you. make yourself heard
